name: STRYKER CORPORATION, et al., petitioners, v. ZIMMER, INC., et al.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
STRYKER CORPORATION, et al., petitioners,
v.
ZIMMER, INC., et al.
attorneys: Motion of Independent Inventor Groups for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Motion of Nokia Technologies OY, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit granted in No. 14-1513 limited to Question 1 presented by the petition. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit in No. 14-1520 granted.
The case is consolidated and a total of one hour is allotted for oral argument.
casebody.head_matter:
STRYKER CORPORATION, et al., petitioners,
v.
ZIMMER, INC., et al.
No. 14-1520.
Supreme Court of the United States
Oct. 19, 2015.
Motion of Independent Inventor Groups for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Motion of Nokia Technologies OY, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit granted in No. 14-1513 limited to Question 1 presented by the petition. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit in No. 14-1520 granted.
The case is consolidated and a total of one hour is allotted for oral argument.
